sentences.sentence: Terminal deoxynucleotidyl transferase-mediated nick end labeling (TUNEL) technique were applied to deterimine the apoptotic cells.
sentences.translation: 用脱氧核糖核酸末端转移酶介导的缺口末端标记技术（TUNEL）检测细胞凋亡。

sentences.sentence: These help a mitochondrial enzyme called carnitine acetyl transferase to do its job.
sentences.translation: 这能有助于一种叫做肉碱乙酰转移酶的线粒体酶的活动。

sentences.sentence: Objective To explore the significance of glutathione S transferase (GST pi) in the early diagnosis of colorectal carcinoma.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨谷胱甘肽S-转移酶（GST）在大肠癌早期诊断中的价值及意义。
